channel.title: CVE Feed for kaptinlin -- Striking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kaptinlin -- Striking

item.title: CVE-2024-37267|2024-07-22T18:25:35.383Z -- kaptinlin -- striking
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in kaptinlin Striking allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Striking: from n/a through 2.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-37268|2024-07-09T14:36:42.396Z -- kaptinlin -- striking
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in kaptinlin Striking allows Path Traversal.This issue affects Striking: from n/a through 2.3.4.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in kaptinlin Striking allows Path Traversal.This issue affects Striking: from n/a through 2.3.4.
